testCaseResult.testCaseName: Repository entity reference copy lifecycle test case
successfulAssertions: repository-test-case-base-01: Repository connector supplied to conformance suite.
repository-test-case-base-02: Metadata collection for repository connector supplied to conformance suite.
repository-entity-reference-copy-lifecycle-00: Threat entity type definition matches known type
repository-entity-reference-copy-lifecycle-01: Threat reference entity created; repository supports storage of reference copies.
repository-entity-reference-copy-lifecycle-02: Threat reference entity can be retrieved as EntitySummary.
repository-entity-reference-copy-lifecycle-03: Threat reference entity can be retrieved as EntityDetail.
repository-entity-reference-copy-lifecycle-04: Threat reference entity matches the entity that was saved.
repository-entity-reference-copy-lifecycle-05: Threat reference entity has no relationships.
repository-entity-reference-copy-lifecycle-06: Threat reference entity status cannot be updated.
repository-entity-reference-copy-lifecycle-06: Threat reference entity status cannot be updated.
repository-entity-reference-copy-lifecycle-07: Threat reference entity properties cannot be updated.
repository-entity-reference-copy-lifecycle-08: Threat reference entity type cannot be changed.
repository-entity-reference-copy-lifecycle-09: Threat reference entity identity cannot be changed.
repository-test-case-base-01: Repository connector supplied to conformance suite.
repository-test-case-base-02: Metadata collection for repository connector supplied to conformance suite.
unsuccessfulAssertions: Unexpected Exception Exception : CTS test repository-entity-reference-copy-lifecycle caught exception FunctionNotSupportedException from method purgeEntityReferenceCopy whilst trying to purge a reference copy of an entity of type Threat.
